rules:
Много - much time (ед. ч.)
Много - many books (мн. ч.)
exerciseText: Переведите на английский язык следующие пары

tasks: I don't eat _ mangoes.
He does not eat _ fish.
She ate so _ dessert that she is in bed today with a stomachache.
That man drank so _ wine, and he smoked so _ cigarettes that he has a terrible headache today.
Mary must not eat too _ food because she has a weight problem.
My mother says I eat too _ French fries and drink too _ beer. She wants me to be healthy.
There is not too _ space in my flat.
There are not _ pictures in this room.
There are so _ teachers at our school, but not _ of them are men.
Not _ of these books are new.
Thanks awfully for the books you sent me yesterday. — Don't mention it, it wasn't _ bother.
_ of her advice was not useful at all.
He had got so _ pairs of socks.
Please don't put _ pepper on the meat.
There were too _ plates on the table.
I never eat _ bread with soup.
Why did you eat so _ ice cream?
She wrote us not very _ letters from the country.
_ of these students don't like to look up words in the dictionary.
Do you drink _ coffee? — Yes, a lot. Do you watch TV _? — No, not _.
Not _ of the answers were correct.
How _ money did you spend last Friday?
The students enjoyed the concert very _.

rules:
Мало - little time (ед. ч.)
Мало - few books (мн. 4.)
exerciseText: Переведите на английский язык следующие пары слов.

tasks: He has got _ friends.
I drink _ coffee. I don't like it.
We must hurry. We've got very _ time.
This university offers very _ scholarships.
The Smiths have _ money. They aren't rich.
The theatre was almost empty. There were very _ people there.
There was _ lemonade in the bottle. There were _ peaches in the basket.
I have _ time, so I can't go with you.
He has _ English books.
There is _ juice in my glass. Have you got any juice?
There are _ bears in the zoo.
Tom Canty was the son of poor parents and had very _ clothes.
There is too _ soup in my soup plate. Give me some more, please.
The children returned from the wood very sad because they had found very _ mushrooms.
There was too _ light in the room, and I could not read.
There are very _ people who don't know that the Earth is round.
I made very _ progress on this assignment.
There is very _ hope of getting financial support for the research project.
Fortunately, very _ passengers were injured in a traffic accident.
Robert wrote so _ letters that he's never going to write a letter again.
She ate so _ ice cream that she's going to have a sore throat.
His father didn't earn _ money, but he enjoyed his job. He loved teaching English very _.
There are _ cookies in the box. I should have bought them last Monday.
Does your sister read _ ? — Yes, she does. And your brother? — Oh, he doesn't. He has so _ books, but he reads very _.
Do you have _ work to do today? — No, not very _.
Walk quicker, please. We have very _ time.
I am sorry to say, I have read very _ books by Walter Scott.
My brother is a young teacher. Every day he spends too _ time preparing for his lessons.
I know very _ about this writer. It is the first book I am reading.
The pupils of our class ask so _ questions at the lesson. They want to know everything.
You do not make _ mistakes in your spelling. Do you work hard on it? — Oh, yes, I do, I work very _.
He is lazy. He's done very _ today.
Very _ people can afford to own a plane.
There is _ traffic on the roads this morning. I'm so glad.
exerciseText: Вставьте much, many, little или few.

rules:
Сравните:
плохо | I have little time. | У меня мало времени.
хорошо | I have a little time. | У меня есть немного времени.
плохо | I have few books. | У меня мало книг.
хорошо | I have a few books. | У меня есть несколько книг.
exerciseText: Переведите на английский язык следующие пары слов.

tasks: There is _ milk in the bottle.
There are _ pears in the fruit bowl.
There is _ fruit salad in the salad bowl.
There are _ tomatoes on the kitchen table. Make a salad! Add _ drops of olive oil and _ salt to the salad.
Put _ cups of flour into a mixing bowl.
Slice _ apples.
Add _ sugar.
Cut up _ oranges.
Chop up _ nuts.
Pour in _ honey.
Mix in _ raisins.
Add _ baking soda.
Add _ eggs, _ vanilla ami _ almonds and beat thoroughly.
Bake until brown and the fruitcake will be ready in _ minutes. Enjoy, dear!
This young man knows _ Russian.
Can't you stay _ longer and help me with my exam?
He's already been to the USA _ times.
Do you mind if I ask you _ questions? — Yes, please. I've got _.time now and I can talk to you.
John has got only _ close friends and they meet quite often.
They had _ money left, so they could go shopping.
I always come on time or early, but she is always _ late.
exerciseText: Вставьте a little или a few.

tasks: There is _ salad left in this bowl.
Would you like _ salad? — Yes, thank you. My doctor says it's good for my health.
I have _ money, so we can go to the cinema.
I have _ money, so we cannot go to the cinema.
This girl works very _ that's why she knows nothing.

This lemon drink is sour; if you put _ sugar in it, it will be sweeter.
This lemon drink is sour; if you put _ lumps of sugar in it, it will be sweeter.
The hall was almost empty: there were very _ people in it.
I can't buy this expensive hat today: I have too _ money.
She left and returned in _ minutes.
I think you can spare me _ time now.
I am sorry I have seen _ plays by this author.
exerciseText: Вставьте little, a little, few или a few.

tasks: When we walked _ farther down the road, we met another group of students.
Have you got _ money on you? — I'm sorry. I have very _ money at the moment.
At the conference we met _ people whom we knew well.
There are very _ old houses left in our street. Most of them have already been pulled down.
If you have _ spare time, look through this book. You will find _ stories there which are rather interesting.
There are _ things here which I cannot understand.
Shall I bring _ more chalk? — No, thank you. There is _ chalk on the desk. I hope that will be enough for our lesson.
He had _ English books at home, so he had to go to the library for more books.
She gave him _ water to wash his hands and face.
I'd like to say _ words about my journey.
After the play everybody felt _ tired.
Let's stay here _ longer: it is such a nice place.
Were there _ new words in the text? Did Peter spend _ time learning them?
There was not _ hay in the barn, and the children could play there.
My friend is going to the concert this evening because he hasn't got _ work to do.
My mother knows German _ and she can help you with the translation of this letter.
He's got very _ time left. If he doesn't hurry up, he'll miss the plane.
I have very _ drinking water left.
exerciseText: Вставьте much, many, little, few, a little или a few.
